name: Buckle Up!
description:
Prepare to 'Buckle up' in a high fantasy gearing up montage! 

After multiple adventures have left you out of gold, you must barter and complete quests for 3 charming yet mysterious shop owners in order to get new weapons to fight against a looming threat. Traverse through the depths of the underground markets, talk with interesting characters and play through this new take on the fantasy formula! 

Buckle Up is a short, 30 minute experience that mixes the best elements of classic fantasy, medieval byzantine culture and D&D adventures. Enjoy a bite-sized story for each merchant, with two distinct pathways and endings for each quest. Complete their demands, either through narrative means or hacking and slashing a swarm of goblins. Be rewarded with an upgrade to your character, and face a boss at the end of the game!


THE TAILOR

Talented in enchantment, weaving and observation. He's as calm as he is mysterious.

THE ARMS DEALER

A stubborn, tactless dwarf who's always seen tired or drinking. Has a passionate hate for goblins.

THE ALCHEMIST

Always wearing a mask. Holds a vast network of agents and couriers, all for her dangerous work.
